timeline.body:
this should be `final`
```suggestion
    protected static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CustomNotificationListener.class);
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
this should be final

Suggested change
protected static Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CustomNotificationListener.class);
protected static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CustomNotificationListener.class);
timeline.author: afalhambra

timeline.body: `logger` expects 3 placeholders but only 2 are provided, also I think there is no harm in using `info` so we can always see the output when running tests
